metadata.title: CVE-2022-36764 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: EDK2 is susceptible to a vulnerability in the Tcg2MeasurePeImage()function, allowing a user to trigger a heap buffer overflow via a localnetwork. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may result in acompromise of confidentiality, integrity, and/or availability.

criterions.comment: edk2 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
